description:
The legendary epic of Electrolux recreates the glorious road of the great necromancer, the undead scourge Electrolux.
　　After stepping out of the faith of light, it is a break from the shackles; and being impacted under the shackles is another closure of the times.
　　Originally a favored child of heaven, Electrolux became a threat to the rule in the interests of the empire. Then the country and the church used his lover to calculate him and decided to wipe him out without hesitation. In the end, Electrolux used his own strength to severely damage the world that betrayed him, creating a generation of legends.
source: movie.douban.com/googletranslate

BAIDU_BAIKE: 神印王座剧场版：伊莱克斯传奇
